skillTree.name: Sadistic
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

skillTree.name: Eternal Hatred
skillTree.description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.name: Greater Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Sacred Slaughterer
skillTree.description: Every ritual execution that Tullaris performs serves as a glorious offering to Khaine, driving the other Executioners he leads to match his skill and devotion with further slaughter.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.name: The Dreaded
skillTree.description: On Ulthuan, Tullaris is known as Drakiur, the Dreadbringer, ever since he captured a band of Shadow Warriors near to the ruins of Anlec and had their body parts nailed to the eastern gate of the ancient citadel.

skillTree.name: Call of Khaine
skillTree.description: While a loyal servant of the Hag Queen, Tullaris' devotion is to Khaine, and Khaine alone. He has slain fellow Executioners without flinching, if he thought that they were remiss in their dedication or showed sloppy blade work.

skillTree.name: Crone's Chosen
skillTree.description: Hellebron immediately took great interest in Tullaris when he was just a young executioner, so much so that when the Executioners first formed a bodyguard for the Hag Queen on a journey to Naggarond, she chose Tullaris to lead it.

effects.description: Attribute: Unbreakable for Tullaris Dreadbringer while embedded in Crone Hellebron's army
Upkeep: -100% for Tullaris Dreadbringer while embedded in Crone Hellebron's army

skillTree.name: Leader of Executioners
skillTree.description: Under his command, the Executioners have partaken in such cold-blooded destruction that they have gained a fearful reputation across the world. Beneath their banner they march at the head of the army, eagerly seeking battle.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear for Har Ganeth Executioners
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: The Hand of Khaine
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -5
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Increase Slave Income
skillTree.description: Civilisation requires slaves. It is upon their toil that the future depends.

effects.description: Increase Slave Income action: Slaves generated per turn is increased by an additional 3
Increase Slave Income action: Slaves generated per turn is increased by an additional 6
Increase Slave Income action: Slaves generated per turn is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen of Khaine
backgroundSkills.description: "Lord Khaine. I send you this meagre offering, the first of many, on your night, Death Night. Let this be a sign of the compact between us, and lend your strength to me. Let the murders I commit this night be in your name and for your glory."

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Hero's army)
